overview: Anthony Costello is a leader in the areas of technology innovation and clinical operations. After beginning his research career at Genentech, Costello went on to co-found several technology start-up companies including Nextrials, a clinical research firm where he worked for 10 years as the VP of Product Development. Costello has also served as Chairman of the Board for the SCDM, on the Founding committee for the CDISC CDASH initiative and is currently a member of the editorial advisory board for Applied Clinical Trials magazine. He is a frequent presenter on topics related to the efficient use of technology and clinical research. He has a degree in Sociology from UC Berkeley.
